## Data Preparation

  filter(GeoName == "United States")

## Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
pers_consum %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Personal.consumption.expenditures)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity")

pers_consum %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Personal.consumption.expenditures)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
pers_consum %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Gasoline.and.other.energy.goods)) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity")

```
